projects.heading: Github-scrapper
projects.description: Automate scrapping entire github with Puppeteer. Search for users and save the username and email from search results into a file.

projects.heading: angular-todo
projects.description: Developed SPA using Angular 6 to built a ToDo app.Users can login with their Google account to add their pending tasks and categorise them into various lists. Made use of Google Firebase for hosting purposes. Also used Google cloud functions to manage the server side code on Node JS. Made use of Google Firestore as database to store user info and details.

projects.heading: github-search
projects.description: Github user search app developed using Angular JS. Made use of Github Rest API to fetch search results and display user and repo details in various charts and diagrams. App deployed using firebase.

projects.heading: crypto-bot
projects.description: Node JS scheduler app to check price of a cryptocoin and mail the status of BUY/SELL to user if the price crosses the provided thresholds.

projects.heading: web-crawler
projects.description: Node JS web crawler to crawl webpages from a starting point and outputs it results in a file

projects.heading: wassup
projects.description: Whatsapp clone created using angular 10. Made use of google firebase's realtime database to send / receive messages

projects.heading: FaceDetection
projects.description: Javascript app which detects expressions on face

projects.heading: birthdayWishApp
projects.description: Replying to all the posts on a birthday can be a tedious task. This is an automated program on pyhton to reply to those messages either all at once or one by one.

projects.heading: Chatter
projects.description: Created this node js chat app which uses Redis server to store, send and receive all the messages.

projects.heading: Bookog
projects.description: Bookog is an online SPA tool to keep a track of the books that a user reads. The user can login by providing the basic info and can start logging the books.
